Title: Requires an individual convicted on an impeachment from reimbursing the state for all costs associated with the impeachment investigation and all costs related to the individual's defense
Summary: Requires an individual convicted on an impeachment to reimburse the state for all costs associated with the impeachment investigation and all costs related to the individual's defense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to requiring an individual convicted on an impeachment from reimbursing the state for all costs associated with the impeachment investigation and costs related to the individual's defense
